wfc-server: the wfc server to connect to, such as 'ppeb.me' or 'localhost'
moderation-roles: The roles allowed to use moderation commands
allowed-servers: Allow guild ids here. Make this array empty or delete it entirely to allow all guilds.
allowed-channels: Allow channel ids here. Make this array empty or delete it entirely to allow all channels.
logs-channel: Channel id to send successful moderative actions to.
public-logs-channel: Channel id to send the public version of moderative actions to.
